trans-unit.source: Represents a control consisting of a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.
trans-unit.target: 表示控制項，此控制項是由可以將容器的顯示區分成兩個可以調整大小之面板的可移動軸所組成。

trans-unit.source: You can add controls to the two resizable panels, and you can add other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> controls to existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> panels to create many resizable display areas.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將控制項加入兩個可調整大小的面板，以及您可以新增其他<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>控制現有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>建立許多可調整大小的面板顯示區域。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control to divide the display area of a container (such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>) and allow the user to resize controls that are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> panels.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>將容器的顯示區域的控制項 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>)，並允許使用者加入至控制項的調整大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>面板。

trans-unit.source: When the user passes the mouse pointer over the splitter, the cursor changes to indicate that the controls inside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者通過滑鼠指標分隔器，而游標會變更，指出控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>控制項可以調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] only support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]僅支援<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Splitter>控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> also eases control placement at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> 在設計階段，也可以簡化控制項位置。

trans-unit.source: For example, to create a window similar to Windows Explorer, add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> control to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要建立類似於 Windows 檔案總管 視窗，加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性`DockStyle.Fill`。

trans-unit.source: Add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill`.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>並設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性`DockStyle.Fill`。

trans-unit.source: To complete the layout, add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property to `DockStyle.Fill` to have the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> occupy the remaining space on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 若要完成版面配置，加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項，並設定其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>屬性`DockStyle.Fill`有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>上佔用剩餘空間<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: At run time, the user can then resize the width of both controls using the splitter.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段，使用者可以再調整大小兩個控制項使用分隔器的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to specify that a control should not be resized along with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or other container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>屬性可指定控制項不連同調整<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>或其他容器。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> to specify where the splitter starts on your form.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>以指定用來分隔您的表單上的起點。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> to specify how many pixels the splitter moves at a time.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>指定像素，以分隔器移動一次。

trans-unit.source: The default for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A> is one pixel.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>是一個像素。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> to specify how close the splitter bar can be moved to the outside edge of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> panel.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>來指定如何關閉的分隔列可以移至外部邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>面板。

trans-unit.source: The default minimum size of a panel is 25 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 面板的預設最小大小為 25 像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property to specify horizontal orientation.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>屬性來指定水平方向。

trans-unit.source: The default orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> is vertical.
trans-unit.target: 預設方向<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>是垂直。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A> property to specify the border style of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> and coordinate its border style with the border style of controls that you add to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BorderStyle%2A>屬性，以指定的框線樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>協調其與您加入的控制項的框線樣式的框線樣式及<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows both a vertical and horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例同時顯示垂直和水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The vertical splitter moves in 10-pixel increments.
trans-unit.target: 垂直分隔器移動 10 像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The left panel of the vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control, and its right panel contains a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直的左的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>控制項，以及其右面板包含水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Both panels of the horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> are filled with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls, and the top panel is defined as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> so that it does not resize when you resize the container.
trans-unit.target: 水平的兩個面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>填滿<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項和上方面板定義為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>，讓它不會調整容器的大小時不調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Moving the vertical splitter raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving> event, signified in this example by a change to the cursor style.
trans-unit.target: 移動垂直分割引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoving>事件，表示在此範例中的資料指標樣式變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event is raised when you stop moving the splitter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved>移動分隔器停止時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This is signified in this example by the cursor style reverting to the default.
trans-unit.target: 這被以在這個範例還原成預設值的資料指標樣式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value indicating whether scroll bars automatically appear if controls are placed outside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> client area.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得或設定值，指出如果控制項置於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 工作區 (Client Area) 外面時，捲軸是否會自動出現。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if scroll bars to automatically appear when controls are placed outside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> client area; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果當控制項置於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 工作區外面時，捲軸會自動出現，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自動捲動邊界的大小。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> value that represents the height and width, in pixels, of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 值，表示自動捲動邊界的高度和寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
trans-unit.target: 自動捲動邊界為任何子控制項的可捲動父控制項邊緣之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A> size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine if scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A>大小也會加入可捲動的控制項來判斷是否需要捲軸中包含任何子控制項的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A> property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A>屬性時可捲動父控制項調整大小或個別子控制項帶入 檢視中，會評估，並且用來判斷是否必須顯示捲軸。

trans-unit.source: Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 從判斷是否必須顯示捲軸的計算中排除停駐的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 從子控制項的邊緣的距離，以可捲動父控制項是否指派給的值小於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMargin%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScroll%2A>屬性設定為`true`，適當的捲軸顯示。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定捲軸大小的最小值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMinSize%2A> property to manage the screen size allocated to the automatic scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoScrollMinSize%2A>屬性來管理配置給自動捲軸的螢幕大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> is automatically resized to display its entire contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 是否會自動調整大小以顯示其全部內容。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> is automatically resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 會自動調整大小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The contents of a control may change for many reasons; including display data changes; addition of child controls; layout and padding changes; or system font, language, or resolution changes.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的內容可能會因許多原因而; 變更包括顯示資料的變更。子控制項，加入版面配置和邊框間距變更;或系統字型、 語言或解析的變更。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoSize%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> will resize automatically to encompass its contents, although it will never be resized to be smaller than its original <xref:System.Drawing.Size>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoSize%2A>屬性設定為`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>會自動調整大小以包含它的內容，雖然它會永遠不會調整大小必須小於其原始<xref:System.Drawing.Size>。

trans-unit.source: This operation will maintain the control’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Padding%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業會維護控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Padding%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.AutoSize" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在控制項中顯示的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> that represents the image to display in the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示要在控制項背景中顯示之影像的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> property to place a graphic image onto a control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>放置圖形影像拖曳至控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Images with translucent or transparent colors are not supported by Windows Forms controls as background images.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form 控制項不支援透明或安全性透明的色彩與影像做為背景影像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported on child controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不支援子控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> named `SplitContainer1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>名為`SplitContainer1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.DefaultSize%2A> property in a derived class to specify a default size for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.DefaultSize%2A>中衍生的類別，以指定的預設大小屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> borders are attached to the edges of the container.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定接上容器邊緣的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 框線。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="None" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="None" />。

trans-unit.source: You can dock a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to any edge of its container, or you can dock a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to all edges of the container so that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> entirely fills the container.
trans-unit.target: 您可以停駐<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>可以固定到其容器，或您的任何邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>容器的所有邊緣以便<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>完全填滿容器。

trans-unit.source: For example, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left?displayProperty=nameWithType> to attach the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to the left edge of its container.
trans-unit.target: 例如，將此屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle.Left?displayProperty=nameWithType>附加的左邊的緣<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>其容器的左邊。

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in z-order.
trans-unit.target: 停駐控制項疊置順序。

trans-unit.source: The z-order corresponds to the depth dimension of the screen, and the x-order and y-order corresponds to the horizontal and vertical dimensions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 疊置順序對應至螢幕的深度維度和 x 順序 y 順序對應水平和垂直維度中，分別。

trans-unit.source: Z-order defines which object appears in front of which, in cases where controls or windows can overlap or occupy the same space on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 疊置順序會定義控制項或 windows 可以重疊或佔據螢幕上的相同空間的物件會出現在前面。

trans-unit.source: A control or window at the top of the z-order appears on top of all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of 0 in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控制項或最上層的疊置順序視窗會顯示在所有其他的控制項或 windows 和 0 中的索引所參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A control or window at the bottom of the z-order appears underneath all other controls or windows and is referenced by an index of `(Controls.Count-1)` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 控制項或視窗底部的疊置順序會顯示底下所有其他的控制項或 windows 和索引所參考`(Controls.Count-1)`中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Controls%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information about anchoring and docking controls, see [How to: Create a Multipane User Interface with Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需錨定和停駐控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立 Multipane 使用者介面搭配 Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-a-multipane-user-interface-with-windows-forms.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the splitter is fixed or movable.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出分隔器是否為固定或是可移動。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the splitter is fixed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果分隔器為固定，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A> property to enable or disable splitter movement.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A>啟用或停用分隔器移動的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might programmatically set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A> to `true` when refreshing the display, when some other control has the focus, or when an event is occurring for which the display areas divided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> must remain constant, and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A> to `false` when those circumstances do not apply.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會以程式設計方式設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A>至`true`一些其他控制項有焦點時，請重新整理畫面中，或當事件已發生的顯示區域除以<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>必須保持常數，並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.IsSplitterFixed%2A>至`false`這些情況下並不適用。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A> event handler allows the user to track the splitter position while it is moved down with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>事件處理常式可讓使用者向下移動滑鼠時，追蹤的分隔器位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A> also draws the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> panels.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 面板的水平或垂直方向。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Orientation" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property to change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> from vertical to horizontal or from horizontal to vertical.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>屬性來變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>從垂直到水平或垂直到水平。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a horizontal splitter whose top and bottom panels contain <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> controls.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示水平分隔器的頂端和底部面板包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a horizontal splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 也會顯示水平分隔器的其他基本屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the left or top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />, depending on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 取得 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 的左方或上方面板。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Vertical" />, the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 為 <see langword="Vertical" />，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左方面板。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Horizontal" />, the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 為 <see langword="Horizontal" />，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的上方面板。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> property to configure the left panel of a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> or the top panel of a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>屬性可設定的垂直左的面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>或上方面板的水平<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to `Panel1` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定面板的大小下限的值變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>屬性，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>屬性`Panel1`，使得面板保持相同的大小調整大小的容器，或您可以取得或設定面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 您無法移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>包含任何可以接收焦點時，焦點會維持為分隔器按一下時其上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To change the focus to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> to 0 and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> to 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要將焦點移到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>設為 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>設為 1。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> contains no control that can receive the focus, the focus remains on the splitter when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>包含任何可以接收焦點時，焦點會維持為分隔器按一下時其上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To change the focus to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> to 0 and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> to 1.
trans-unit.target: 若要將焦點移到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>設為 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value determining whether <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> is collapsed or expanded.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，決定是否要摺疊或展開 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> is collapsed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已摺疊 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> 的左邊緣或上邊緣算起的分隔器距離的最小值 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示從 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1" /> 的左邊緣或上邊緣算起的分隔器距離的最小值 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 25 pixels, regardless of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 25 像素，與 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 無關。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> property to prevent the splitter from moving too close to the left or top edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>屬性，避免分隔器移動太靠近左邊或最上層容器的邊緣。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to prevent some of the display area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> from being covered.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能想要防止部分的顯示區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView>從所涵蓋。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Vertical` (the default), <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the left edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>屬性是`Vertical`（預設）、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>傳回的最小的距離單位為像素的分隔器左邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> property is `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A> returns the minimum distance in pixels of the splitter from the top edge of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>屬性是`Horizontal`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1MinSize%2A>單位為像素的分隔器傳回的最小距離上邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A> (the left panel) is set to 30 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the left edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示垂直分割位置的大小下限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>（左的面板） 會設定為 30 像素，現在，這是用來分隔可以是從容器的左邊緣的最小距離。

trans-unit.source: Other basic properties of a vertical splitter are also shown.
trans-unit.target: 也會顯示其他的垂直分割的基本屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the right or bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />, depending on <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 取得 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 的右方或下方面板。

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Vertical" />, the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> is <see langword="Horizontal" />, the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation" /> 為 <see langword="Horizontal" />，則為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的下方面板。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> property to configure the right panel of a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> or the bottom panel of a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>屬性可設定垂直的右方面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>或水平的下方面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify the minimum size of the panel by changing the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A> property, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A> property to `Panel2` so that the panel remains the same size when the container is resized, or you can get or set the panel's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定面板的大小下限的值變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>屬性，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.FixedPanel%2A>屬性`Panel2`，使得面板保持相同的大小調整大小的容器，或您可以取得或設定面板<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImage%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 您無法移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.target: 若要將焦點移到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>設為 0 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitterPanel.TabIndex%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>設為 1。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示從 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2" /> 的右邊緣或下邊緣算起的分隔器距離的最小值 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>屬性是`Vertical`（預設）、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2MinSize%2A>分隔器可以從右邊緣的像素為單位傳回的最小距離<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a vertical splitter where the minimum size of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A> (the right panel) is set to 20 pixels, which is now the minimum distance the splitter can be from the right edge of the container.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值與方向不相容。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Keys" /> 值，表示要處理的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: 處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵已由控制項處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog box key characters, such as TAB, LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW.
trans-unit.target: 訊息處理對話方塊按鍵字元，例如索引標籤、 向左鍵、 向右箭號、 向上鍵和向下箭號的前置處理期間呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Keys that include the ALT or CONTROL modifiers are not handled.
trans-unit.target: 不會處理包含 ALT 或控制項的修飾詞的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: 只有當呼叫這個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsInputKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法表示控制項未處理的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> simply sends the character to the parent's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>只傳送至父代的字元<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法或傳回`false`如果控制項沒有父代。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別會覆寫此方法以執行實際處理對話方塊按鍵。

trans-unit.source: The run time calls this method only when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 只有當控制項裝載在 Windows Forms 應用程式，或為 ActiveX 控制項，執行的階段會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" />

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" /> method in a derived class, a control should return <see langword="true" /> to indicate that it has processed the key.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)" />方法在衍生類別中的，控制項應該傳回<see langword="true" />以表示它具有處理金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For keys that are not processed by the control, the result of calling the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" /> method should be returned.
trans-unit.target: 針對該控制項，呼叫基底類別的結果不會處理識別碼<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessDialogChar(System.Char)" />方法應該傳回。

trans-unit.source: Controls will seldom, if ever, need to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 控制項很少，如果有的話，必須覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cycle forward through the controls in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 順向循環 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl" /> 中的控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Selects the next available control and makes it the active control.
trans-unit.target: 選取下一個可用的控制項並使它成為作用中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a control is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已選取控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> controls the tab focus order in the following manner:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> 以下列方式控制索引標籤焦點順序：

trans-unit.source: From the first control outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> to the first control on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 從第一個控制項外<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>上的第一個控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>。

trans-unit.source: All controls on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 上的所有控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel1%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The splitter (so that the user can use the arrow keys to move the splitter).
trans-unit.target: 用來分隔 （以便使用者可以使用方向鍵來移動分隔器）。

trans-unit.source: All controls on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 上的所有控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Panel2%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The second control outside the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> that is next in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 第二個控制項外的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>就定位順序中下一步。

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: 控制項高度與寬度的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified" /> 值，指定在定義控制項的大小和位置時所用的控制項範圍。

trans-unit.source: Scales the location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: 縮放位置、大小、邊框間距和邊界。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 以指定要選取控制項的方向，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to move forward in the tab order; <see langword="false" /> to move backward in the tab order.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左邊緣或上邊緣算起的分隔器位置 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 的左邊緣或上邊緣算起的分隔器位置 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 50 像素。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> property to determine or specify the distance in pixels of the splitter from the left or top edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>屬性來判斷，或指定的距離，單位為像素的分隔器左邊或最上層容器的邊緣。

trans-unit.source: You can both specify an initial distance and change the distance at design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以同時指定初始的距離和變更的距離，在設計階段或執行階段。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> is `Horizontal`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> is calculated in pixels from the top edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>是`Horizontal`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>計算像素為單位，從上邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A> is `Vertical`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> is calculated in pixels from the left edge of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>是`Vertical`，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>計算像素為單位，從左邊緣<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterIncrement%2A>屬性以建立較大的增量，超過一個像素貼齊的分隔器移動。

trans-unit.target: 發生於移動分隔器控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the splitter control is in the process of moving.
trans-unit.target: 發生於分隔器控制項在移動的過程中時。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the user moves the splitter control.
trans-unit.target: 只有當使用者移動分隔器控制項時，就會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: It does not occur when you change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A> property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 它不會發生變更時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterDistance%2A>屬性值，以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved> event is raised when you stop moving the splitter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterMoved>移動分隔器停止時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the splitter relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得相對於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 之分隔器的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the size and location of the splitter relative to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，指定相對於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer" /> 之分隔器的大小和位置。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to get the width and height of the splitter relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>取得相對於分隔器的高度與寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A> event handlers draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> to show the current position of the splitter while it is moving.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyDown%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnKeyUp%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseDown%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseUp%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.OnMouseMove%2A>事件處理常式繪製<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>移動時會顯示分隔器的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> values vary depending on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 意義<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>值不同，取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.Orientation%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The output of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A> is in the format `{X, Y, Width, Height}`.
trans-unit.target: 輸出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>格式`{X, Y, Width, Height}`。

trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的意義<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterRectangle%2A>垂直和水平分隔器的值。

trans-unit.target: 水平分隔器

trans-unit.target: X

trans-unit.target: 寬度

trans-unit.target: 分隔器寬度。

trans-unit.target: 分隔器的高度等於高度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 高度

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.SplitterWidth%2A>屬性未變更的分隔器本身，寬度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.target: 也會顯示其他的垂直分割的基本屬性。

trans-unit.source: The value is less than one or is incompatible with the orientation.
trans-unit.target: 這個值小於一或與方向不相容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can give the focus to the splitter using the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否能使用 TAB 鍵為分隔器提供焦點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the user can give the focus to the splitter using the TAB key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以使用 TAB 鍵為分隔器提供焦點，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: When the user presses the TAB key, the input focus is set to the next control in the tab order of the form.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按下 TAB 鍵時，則會將輸入的焦點設定為表單的定位順序中的下一個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A> to `true` to give input focus to a splitter so that it can be moved with the arrow keys as well as with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A>至`true`以使其可以搭配方向鍵以及滑鼠移動分隔器提供輸入的焦點。

trans-unit.source: Starting in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A> to `false` excludes the splitter and any of the controls that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer> from the collection of controls in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.TabStop%2A>至`false`排除分隔器，以及任何控制項中所包含的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>從定位順序中的控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to get focus by using the TAB key, create a control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓使用 TAB 鍵來取得焦點的控制項，請建立繼承自控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>。

trans-unit.source: Create a new property named `TabStop` and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的屬性，名為`TabStop`並覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer.ProcessTabKey%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to accomplish this.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何完成這項作業。

trans-unit.source: You can manipulate the tab order by setting the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定控制項的操作索引標籤順序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabIndex%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.target: 字串。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 所有訊息都會都傳送至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>方法之後被篩透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> 方法完全對應於 Windows `WindowProc` 函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function in the Platform SDK documentation at http://msdn.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何處理 Windows 訊息的詳細資訊，請參閱`WindowProc`的 Platform SDK 文件中的函式http://msdn.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: for inheriting classes to call unmanaged code or for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 繼承類別呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼，或呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Inheriting controls should call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> method to process any messages that they do not handle.
trans-unit.target: 繼承的控制項，應該呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />方法來處理未處理任何訊息。
